__e: If I had done this, I'm not saying I did, I might've, I could've.
I wanted to talk to her really bad but I did not, because that is how I would have talked to her:
You know as well as I do it'd never get done in time.
I think about it from time to time, but it would have been the biggest mistake to have that baby.
If your father had been a better man, your mother wouldn't be where she is now.
What if I had been a bit more...
If it wasn't for her... But it's true.
If it hadn't been for your mother and father, I don't know what I would've done.
I don't even want to think about what would have happened to him if it wasn't for her.
If it had at least been with a man of her own people- if it had been with a better man.
I got a million things on my plate right now, you know, and... and maybe in a different place, a different time, it would be a different story, but right now, here, it just...
I don't know what I'd be doing if it weren't for him.
I might have said so once.
To tell you the truth, I would have felt better if she had told me there was another man
She didn't have to die. If only she'd told me... she was going back to Michael.
Well, sounds to me like maybe you two aren't such good friends after all.
- Sorry, I wouldn't have said this now, but today has made me realise something too.
I don't think so, not without telling me.
In fact, you thought that door was so closed that you went out to another door, but had I known that the first door was open, that's the door I wanted to walk through.
If I had known she wasn't actually his wife...
If he knew he was the murderer, why would he do that?
If I only knew then what I know now...
Don´t you think it would have been nice... if I´d known this before I talked to The Street?
If I had known that sooner, then perhaps I wouldn't have made an enemy of someone who might otherwise have been a dear, dear friend.
It was like I wasn't even there.
Well, someone broke into your office, which is in the next room, and what if I was here?
Like it hadn't been there very long.
He said he knew I'd do the same thing if I was in his position.
I DON'T KNOW THAT YOUR FATHER WOULD AGREE WITH THAT.
Why do I feel as if I've already been here?
She could not have been worse in that meeting than if she had wanted me to...
In fact, I think he, he really wanted me to, be a boy.
I felt like I wanted them more than you did.
He was like a father to me, the father I wish I had.
- Yes, but not in the way I wanted you to.
